appStatus.title: Platform status
appStatus.subtitle: Check the operation of SEND, view service disruption history and download the attestations (binding on third parties). Each attestation certifies a service disruption. This may be useful if the disruption affected a notification intended for you.

statusDescription.not-ok: Service disrupted at this time. For more details, see the table below.

noFileAvailableByStatus.OK: The attestation will be available shortly
noFileAvailableByStatus.KO: The attestation will be available at the end of the disruption
